DOC.detailed_description: This study consist four , 3-hour postprandial trial response consume follow dietary treatment : 1. oral glucose challenge , 2. oral glucose challenge combination non-fat milk , 3. oral glucose challenge combination whey protein isolate , 4. oral glucose challenge combination sodium caseinate . CVD 5. nonsmoker 6. individual blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg total cholesterol < 240 mg/dL 1. unstable weight ( ±2 kg ) 2. vegetarian dairy allergy 3. alcohol intake > 3 drinks/day > 10 drinks/week 4 . ≥7 hours/week aerobic activity
